title: Verify tenant page displayed and check all the elements displayed
testName: Verify tenant login page -  Verify tenant page displayed and check all the elements displayed
testError: Timed out retrying: Expected to find element: '#login-error > ul > li', but never found it.
testCommands: assert expected **<object>** to exist in the DOM
assert expected **<object#mf-logo>** to exist in the DOM
assert expected **<a.btn.btn-link.navbar-btn>** to exist in the DOM
assert expected **<a.btn.btn-link.navbar-btn>** to contain **Fortify Security Products**
assert expected **<input#loginEmail.form-control.input-lg>** to have attribute **placeholder** with the value **Username**
assert expected **<input#loginPassword.form-control.input-lg>** to have attribute **placeholder** with the value **Password**
assert expected **<input#loginTenantID.form-control.input-lg>** to have attribute **placeholder** with the value **Tenant**
assert expected **<a>** to exist in the DOM
assert expected **<a>** to contain **Forgot Your Password?**
assert expected **<object>** to exist in the DOM
assert expected **<input#btnLogin.btn.btn-primary.btn-primary-flat>** to exist in the DOM
assert expected **#login-error > ul > li** to exist in the DOM
